questions.q: What language is this REPL implemented in?
What is the main advantage over the Python version?
How is code organized in this project?
questions.a: Using literate programming with org-mode, all code is tangled from CLOJURE-GEMINI-REPL.org

questions.q: What data format is used for persistence?
questions.a: EDN (Extensible Data Notation) instead of JSON
Using Clojure multimethods for extensible dispatch
